items.sentence: Tom is now middle age and has serious health problems.
Tom is the one who told me that I should study French.
Everybody who is anybody was present at the reception.
Have you framed those pictures I brought in last week?
How did you know Tom was going to the dance with Mary?
Tom and Mary started dating each other quite recently.
Tom and Mary started throwing snowballs at each other.
Tom and Mary were discussing their problems with John.
Tom and Mary were kissing each other when I walked in.
I don\'t know if this is the right thing to do or not.
I don\'t know what to do about this difficult problem.
I don\'t know what to do and neither does anyone else.
I don\'t know when Tom and I are supposed to be there.
Look to the left and right before crossing the street.
Make sure to turn off all the lights before going out.
Tom wasn\'t afraid to talk about his own shortcomings.
Tom whispered something in Mary\'s ear and she nodded.
I have an important project I\'m working on right now.
I think it\'s time for me to walk away from this mess.
Tom rolled up his pant legs so they wouldn\'t get wet.
